tossup_question: -   –  Photons and gluons are classified as which of the following types of particles?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Lepton
X) Hadron
Y) Meson
Z) Boson
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is the sole variable that must be equal among different photons in order for electromagnetic radiation to be considered coherent?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Frequency
X) Direction
Y) Phase
Z) Polarization
